item.description:
Reviving Salisbury Beach !!

Welcome to SPLASH! Formerly Bevie B’s Seaside Bar is now a 5000 square foot liquid lounge with an over-sized bar, individual tables, VIP areas and an incredible dance floor.  After extensive renovations you’ve got to see it to believe it!  Make this high-end nightclub part of your next night out!

  Valet parking is available Friday and Saturday nights!  Check our entertainment schedule, don’t miss a beat! Cocktails and Beverages

Our bartenders will quench your thirst with creative concoctions that represent the bold flavor of SPLASH while bringing you back to Old Salisbury Beach!

 

 Groove Alliance is a 9-piece show band, built around the dynamic vocals of Mike Pacheco and Amy Fichera. With outstanding 4-part harmonies, a seriously groove-infused rhythm section and an all-star 3-piece horn section that is unmatched in New  England -- Groove Alliance packs a serious one-two punch with their  precision-playing and unparalleled presentation!  Movement, dancing,  energy and fun packed  into each and every show ... don't be surprised when the brass section hits the dance floor and sends your party into entertainment  over-drive!  This well-rehearsed, talented band always  plays tight and hot with an end result that is downright groovy!

Band- Groove Alliance

Band Start- TIME 9PM-1AM

I WILL BE THERE BY 8 FOR THOSE WISHING TO JOIN ME FOR MIX AND MINGLE AND TO HELP FIND SEATING

NO COVER

AMPLE PARKING

FOOD IS ALLOWED TO BE BROUGHT INSIDE PLENTY OF VENDORS ARE AVAILABLE.

COME ENJOY THE BEST ENTERTAINMENT AT SENSATIONAL SALSBURY BEACH!!

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: LETS HEAD TO THE BEACH CHECK OUT NEW VENUE "SPLASH"
